user.title: Configure CozyLife
user.description:
Click Submit to begin scanning your network for connected devices.

Home Assistant will probe each detected subnet within the default range 192.168.0.0 - 192.168.0.255 using TCP port 5555.

Tick the box to specify a custom IP range instead.

select_many.title: Select CozyLife devices
select_many.description: Choose the discovered CozyLife devices that you would like to add to Home Assistant. You can select more than one device before continuing.
